close_track: You are close to a new track.
decide_option: What do you decide to do?
decision_1: Share with everyone what you have discovered and in this way investigate more what happened
decision_2: Remove everything you have found out and that remains a mystery
error_pumb: The connection is not complete. Try again!
go_mystery_screent: Go to the mystery screnn to continue with the new track.
go_to_location: Go to the starting location of the route
how_to_play_1_body: Browse through available routes and pick one that interests you. Each route contains a unique mystery to solve.
how_to_play_2_body: Visit real-world locations guided by the map. Each stop reveals part of the story and new clues.
how_to_play_3_body: At each point, you‚Äôll need to solve a puzzle, enigma, or mini-game to progress through the mystery.
how_to_play_4_body: Each completed challenge brings you closer to the solution and earns you in-game rewards.
how_to_play_5_body: Put all the clues together to solve the final mystery and complete the route!
how_to_play_tips_body:
- Make sure your GPS is on.
- You can return to a route if you didn‚Äôt finish it.
- Don‚Äôt forget to have fun while solving!
incorrect_cryp: Try again, it's not quite right.
incorrect_phrase: The sentence is not correct. Try again! Now you will have a little help.
ins_map: Move the map fragments to rebuild it and reveal the coordinates.
ins_rebuild: Drag the pieces to recompose the shield of the family.
ins_trans_game: Reorganize words to form the correct sentence:
ins_pumb_game:
